t: Automate Ansible playbook deployment with Amazon EC2 and GitHub | Integration & Automation

t: amazon.aws.ec2_instance module – Create & manage EC2 instances — Ansible Community Documentation
s: This module is part of the amazon.aws collection (version 9.4.0). You might already have this collection installed if you are using the ansible package. It is not included in ansible-core.
